Package jpass.xml.converter

Class XmlConverter<T>

java.lang.Object
jpass.xml.converter.XmlConverter<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of object to map
public class XmlConverter<T>
extends Object
Class for conversion between objects and streams representing XMLs.
Author:
Gabor_Bata
